body: I just got my first prestige today! I would like to thank Zeus_B for being my last kill and 123cheeseballs for letting me spleef him almost until i got it, but Princezz_Dubstep kicked me. Sorry Princezz_Dubstep i should of said in chat. But anyways i got it and that's all that matters. :)
